divs: Sighting Details went back again tonight and saw 3 objects withpulsatings lights and erractic movements - first one was brighter than the other2 and it came the north going toward the south and then went out - the other 2came from the east and was traveling toward the west and also they went out ,allways like it knows someone is watching them and it happens on a nightly basis, from 9 pm on is the times we have observed them, and we are interested infinding out what they are and where they are coming from because it couldnt bea normal airplane and or swamp gas
